tool_description: Discover the best deals in Mexico with Price Guide MX! Our innovative API retrieves and compares product prices from major retail chains, helping you save money on your purchases. Try Price Guide MX today and shop smarter!
name: Price Guide MX
title: Price Guide MX

api_list.name: Get all prices for a specific product
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all the prices of a product offered by major retail chains in Mexico.

required_parameters.name: product
required_parameters.description: The name of the product for which you want to retrieve prices from major retail chains in Mexico.

optional_parameters.name: storeName
optional_parameters.description: The name of the retail chain from which you want to retrieve product prices in Mexico.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The state in Mexico from which you want to retrieve product prices offered by major retail chains.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description: The brand name of the product for which you want to retrieve prices

optional_parameters.name: presentation
optional_parameters.description: The “presentation” parameter is used to specify the weight, type of packaging, size, and/or quantity of the product for which you want to retrieve prices/

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city in Mexico from which you want to retrieve product prices offered by major retail chains.
